verses.verse: The <S%H4633>plans<s%> of the <S%H3820>heart<s%> belong to <S%H120>man,<s%> But the <S%H4617>answer<s%> of the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is from the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%> are <S%H2134>clean<s%> in his own <S%H5869>sight,<s%> But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8505>weighs<s%> the <S%H7307>motives.<s%>
<S%H1556>Commit<s%> your <S%H4639>works<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And your <S%H4284>plans<s%> will be <S%H3559>established.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6466>made<s%> <S%H3605>everything<s%> for its own <S%H4617>purpose,<s%> <S%H1571>Even<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H9567>evil.<s%>
<S%H3605>Everyone<s%> who is <S%H1364>proud<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H3027>Assuredly,<s%> he will not be <S%H5352>unpunished.<s%>

By <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> is <S%H3722>atoned<s%> for, And by the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> one <S%H5493>keeps<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> from <S%H9563>evil.<s%>
When a man's <S%H1870>ways<s%> are <S%H7521>pleasing<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> He <S%H7999>makes<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> his <S%H340>enemies<s%> to be at <S%H7999>peace<s%> with him.
<S%H2896>Better<s%> is a <S%H4592>little<s%> with <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H4480>Than<s%> <S%H7230>great<s%> <S%H8393>income<s%> with <S%H3808>injustice.<s%> <S%H4941><s%>
The <S%H3820>mind<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H2803>plans<s%> his <S%H1870>way,<s%> But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3559>directs<s%> his <S%H6806>steps.<s%>
A <S%H7081>divine<s%> <S%H7081>decision<s%> is in the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of the <S%H4428>king;<s%> His <S%H6310>mouth<s%> should not <S%H4603>err<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>
A <S%H4941>just<s%> <S%H6425>balance<s%> and <S%H3976>scales<s%> belong to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H68>weights<s%> of the <S%H3599>bag<s%> are His <S%H4639>concern.<s%>
It is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> for <S%H4428>kings<s%> to <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H7562>wickedness,<s%> For a <S%H3678>throne<s%> is <S%H3559>established<s%> on <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>
<S%H6664>Righteous<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> are the <S%H7522>delight<s%> of <S%H4428>kings,<s%> And he who <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H3477>right<s%> is <S%H157>loved.<s%>
The <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of a <S%H4428>king<s%> is [as] <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of <S%H4194>death,<s%> But a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> will <S%H3722>appease<s%> it.
In the <S%H216>light<s%> of a king's <S%H6440>face<s%> is <S%H9132>life,<s%> And his <S%H7522>favor<s%> is like a <S%H5645>cloud<s%> with the <S%H4456>spring<s%> <S%H4456>rain.<s%>

<S%H4100>How<s%> much <S%H2896>better<s%> it is to <S%H7069>get<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H2742>gold!<s%> And to <S%H7069>get<s%> <S%H998>understanding<s%> is to be <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H3701>silver.<s%>
The <S%H4546>highway<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> is to <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H9563>evil;<s%> He who <S%H5341>watches<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8104>preserves<s%> his <S%H5315>life.<s%>
<S%H1347>Pride<s%> [goes] <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7667>destruction,<s%> And a <S%H1363>haughty<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3783>stumbling.<s%>
It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to be of a <S%H8217>humble<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> with the <S%H6041>lowly,<s%> <S%H4480>Than<s%> to <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> with the <S%H1343>proud.<s%>
He who <S%H7919>gives<s%> <S%H7919>attention<s%> to the <S%H1697>word<s%> shall <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H9185>good,<s%> And <S%H835>blessed<s%> is he who <S%H982>trusts<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
The <S%H2450>wise<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> will be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H995>discerning,<s%> And <S%H4986>sweetness<s%> of <S%H8193>speech<s%> <S%H3254>increases<s%> <S%H3948>persuasiveness.<s%>
<S%H7922>Understanding<s%> is a <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of <S%H9132>life<s%> to him <S%H1167>who<s%> <S%H1167>has<s%> it, But the <S%H4148>discipline<s%> of <S%H191>fools<s%> is <S%H200>folly.<s%>
The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H7919>teaches<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> And <S%H3254>adds<s%> <S%H3948>persuasiveness<s%> to his <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
<S%H5278>Pleasant<s%> <S%H561>words<s%> are a <S%H1706>honeycomb,<s%> <S%H6688><s%> <S%H4966>Sweet<s%> to the <S%H5315>soul<s%> and <S%H4832>healing<s%> to the <S%H6106>bones.<s%>
<S%H3426>There<s%> is a <S%H1870>way<s%> [which seems] <S%H3477>right<s%> to a <S%H376>man,<s%> But its <S%H319>end<s%> is the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H4194>death.<s%>
A worker's <S%H5315>appetite<s%> <S%H5998>works<s%> for him, For his <S%H6310>hunger<s%> <S%H404>urges<s%> him [on.]
A <S%H1100>worthless<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3738>digs<s%> up <S%H9567>evil,<s%> <S%H5921>While<s%> his <S%H8193>words<s%> are as a <S%H9498>scorching<s%> <S%H784>fire.<s%>
A <S%H8419>perverse<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7971>spreads<s%> <S%H4066>strife,<s%> And a <S%H7279>slanderer<s%> <S%H6504>separates<s%> <S%H9017>intimate<s%> <S%H9017>friends.<s%>
A <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H2555>violence<s%> <S%H6601>entices<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> And <S%H1980>leads<s%> him in a <S%H1870>way<s%> that is not <S%H2896>good.<s%>

He who <S%H6095>winks<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> [does so] to <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H8419>perverse<s%> <S%H8419>things;<s%> He who <S%H7169>compresses<s%> his <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H3615>brings<s%> <S%H9567>evil<s%> to <S%H3615>pass.<s%>
A <S%H7872>gray<s%> <S%H7872>head<s%> is a <S%H5850>crown<s%> of <S%H8597>glory;<s%> It is <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

He <S%H750>who<s%> is <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H1368>mighty,<s%> And he who <S%H4910>rules<s%> his <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> he who <S%H3920>captures<s%> a <S%H5892>city.<s%>
The <S%H1486>lot<s%> is <S%H2904>cast<s%> into the <S%H2436>lap,<s%> But its <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4941>decision<s%> is from the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
